Angel Cat:
So, here's the gist:
If you hunt monsters in the Lineage II world, you have a chance of obtaining letter-engraved items. If you collect these letters and bring them to me, I will give you a gift depending on the combination.
There are a total of 14 letters, and they are:
A, C, E, F, G, I, L, N, O, S, T, II, R, and H.



Combine the letters and numbers to create LINEAGE II, TOGETHER, or NCSOFT.
When you collect repeat letters, you can exchange them for Letter Collector's Lucky Pouch. From the pouch, you can get Letter Collector's Pouch: RIIS, from which you'll have a chance to get the letters R, II, or S.
